revenue_performance.analysis: Revenue increased BECAUSE of strong performance in the Trademark Coca-Cola category and recovery in away-from-home channels.

management_guidance_audit: The management's tone is cautiously optimistic, focusing on recovery and growth opportunities post-pandemic. They emphasize cost management and strategic investments to drive future growth.
key_risks_evidence: Recoverability of Current and Noncurrent Assets | Economic, political, and regulatory uncertainties in various markets could impact asset values. | COCACOLA_2021_10K.pdf | c3ad49de5ca6247d
Product Safety and Quality | Concerns over ingredients and compliance with safety standards could affect consumer trust and sales. | COCACOLA_2021_10K.pdf | b708fce87cca2d7f
Data Privacy and Security | Compliance with evolving data protection laws could increase operational costs. | COCACOLA_2021_10K.pdf | 843a1086190a927c
COVID-19 Pandemic | Ongoing impacts and government actions related to COVID-19 could affect operations and financial performance. | COCACOLA_2021_10K.pdf | 24632fd3a7ed1f00
